item.title: Introduction
item.description: Version 2.0.1 The Electrum CRM Portal Interface describes a server interface against which calls can be made to retrieve information from a backend CRM system. The intended use cases include the lookup of customer-linked account or purchase history data from a bank or retailer's CRM environment. It is not intended that the CRM system is hosted by Electrum, but rather that this interface abstracts the logic required to execute a set of predefined CRM queries, hence simplifying communication.

item.title: Swagger
item.description: The swagger (Open API) definition of the interface specification can be found here, as well as below. Many tools are available for processing swagger files, and using a code generation tool to create a boilerplate client or server can be an excellent starting point for development. We highly recommend looking at swagger-codegen for a generator in your preferred language when starting out.
